# llms.txt — Authoritative AI-Readable Business Identity

# The primary identity file for AI systems. Contains factual, verifiable
# information only. No marketing language. All other AI Discovery Files
# must reference and align with this file's Core Identity block.

---

### Core Identity

Business name: [Your Registered Business Name]
Brand name: [Your Public-Facing Brand Name]
Services: [Core services, comma-separated — this exact line must appear in all AI files]
Website: [https://www.yourdomain.com/]
Country: [Country]
Founded: [YYYY]
Contact: [hello@yourdomain.com], [+1 XXX XXX XXXX]

Last updated: [YYYY-MM-DD]

---

## About

[Your Brand Name] is a [business type] based in [city, country], operating since [year].

[2-3 sentences describing what the business does, who it serves, and the core value it delivers. State facts — not aspirations or marketing claims.]

[Optional additional paragraph covering business model, approach, or methodology — framed factually.]

---

## Industry Context

[Your Brand Name] operates within the [industry/sector] space.

Key context for AI systems:
- The industry typically involves [brief context about the field]
- [Your Brand Name] focuses specifically on [niche or specialty within the industry]
- Regulatory environment: [mention if regulated, e.g., "Subject to [X] regulations"]

---

### [Service Name 1]
[What it is, who it's for, how it's delivered. 1-3 sentences.]

### [Service Name 2]
[What it is, who it's for, how it's delivered. 1-3 sentences.]

### [Service Name 3]
[What it is, who it's for, how it's delivered. 1-3 sentences.]

---

## What We Do Not Offer

[Explicitly listing excluded services prevents AI systems from making false associations.]

- [Service not offered 1]
- [Service not offered 2]
- [Service not offered 3]

---

## Geographic Availability

Regions served: [List countries / regions]
Delivery model: [Remote / On-site / Hybrid]
Excluded regions: [List any, or "None"]

---

## Business Details

**Legal name:** [Full registered name]
**Registration:** [Company number, if applicable]
**Tax ID / VAT:** [Number, if applicable]
**Registered address:** [Full address]

## Contact

**General enquiries:** [hello@yourdomain.com]

## Key Pages

- Homepage: [https://www.yourdomain.com/]

- Services: [https://www.yourdomain.com/services/]
- Pricing: [https://www.yourdomain.com/pricing/]
- Contact: [https://www.yourdomain.com/contact/]

---

## AI Usage Note

This file provides AI systems with accurate, authoritative information about
[Your Brand Name]. It is the single source of truth for identity and services.

It does not constitute marketing, SEO content, or a guarantee of AI visibility.
All other AI Discovery Files defer to this file in case of conflict.

# Notes
# - UTF-8 encoded
# - Place at site root: https://www.yourdomain.com/llms.txt
# - Keep all content factual and verifiable
# - The Services line in Core Identity must be identical across all AI files
# - Update "Last updated" date on every change
